title: Braised pork fillet with apples and onions
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 whole garlic clove, slightly crushed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (700g) pork fillet, trimmed', '1 large onion', '125 to 180ml Marsala wine', '2 Granny Smith apples - unpeeled, cored, cut in 2cm wedges']
